Savenor's Butcher Shop and Market/ Premium specialty butcher shop  Store Hours: 11 am to 7 pm Mon-Fri ; 11 am to 5 pm Sat Cambridge store is closed Sundays and Mondays Boston store is closed on Sundays No results found. Home Shop Prime Beef Heritage Pork Pastured Lamb Poultry Seafood Produce Charcuterie Bone Broth Grocery Selections Gift Card E-GIFT CARD Physical Gift Card Kitchen Videos and Recipes Butchery 101 Recipes Contact Us About History Career Privacy Policy FAQs Menu 90 Kirkland Street Unit 1 Cambridge, MA, 02138 Phone Number Premium Whole Animal Butcher Shop Your Custom Text Here 3rd Generation Master Butcher, Ron Savenor, conducts a demo for team members - setting the standards for “If it’s not good enough to bring home to your mother, it’s not good enough for our customers.” “Best On The Block” whole animal butchery, wild game, & custom cuts - we provide only the Best ingredients for your recipes SHop now Nice to Meat You At Savenor’s, we are passionate about serving you the best quality meats so you can enjoy a gastronomic experience like no other. From our humanely-raised and pastured lamb, USDA Prime and local beef, Vermont GMO-free/Antibiotic-free Berkshire pork, and organic free-range chicken to our specialty cuts of wild game meats and hard-to-find offals, we take great pride in delivering the most delicious and mouth-watering options to your table. And we're not just talking about locally sourced ingredients - we go above and beyond to ensure that every cut of meat is of the highest quality, so you can taste the difference in every bite. Whether you're a seasoned chef or just getting your feet wet in the kitchen, we've got you covered. WHO we are Order before 11am for same day delivery Monday - Saturday CSAs Program Upgrade your food experience with Savenor’s - Try our recipes and tips Butcher Michelle holding a freshly butchered local Berkshire ham (pork hind leg). The pig came from Heritage Grazers in Vermont. If you have any concerns regarding our goods or cooking methods, need assistance selecting the ideal cut of meat for your requirements, please don't hesitate to ask our helpful and knowledgeable team. What sets us unique from other butchers is our dedication to quality and happy customers. We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you at our store.
